plot outline: 'Jodi Kagaze Lekho Naam' is the love story of Subho and Riya. Subho and Riya are college sweethearts who love each other deeply. But Subho is forced to marry another girl because his father had promised her parents. Heart broken Riya goes to another town and starts working as a teacher. Subho's wife dies of blood cancer after leaving a daughter behind. After years Subho and Riya meet. But an accident leaves Subho blind. Dr. Samaresh, Riya's fiance helps Subho get back his eyesight. Samaresh unites Subho and Riya when he hears of their love story.
